alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:44PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pima County through 530 PM MST... At 441 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorm from Pisinemo to the junction of Highway 86 and Route 15, or 25 miles west of Sells, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pisinemo, Covered Wells, Santa Cruz and Mountain Village. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 80 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
